content.detailedDescription: #1 i was in my car driving to work near batavia oh route #32 at frist i thought it was mars but the ufo got bigger which i thought it was coming toward me the  object was orange round i didnt hear any noise. i stopped the car to watch it hover over the car in a few seconds it disapeared and reappeared and flu to a eastern direction with a wobble. the weather was com & clear.Had a little fear.It disapeared over the car and then reappeared and headed east.
content.summary: I saw the ufo at high altitude coming at me it was round and and oronge in color and hovered over my car,

content.detailedDescription:
Noon october 13 2013. guinness book of world records was at kc chiefs for record breaking 50 plane fly over. i was photographing the event with my children along with several others. using a canon 400 with zoom at 3 fps.
never seen the object until i down loaded images onto my computer. object did not appear in any other frame but the one. at first glance i dismissed it as a probable bird until i enhanced the photo and it showed no structure. it was there and in 1/3 of a second gone. none of us saw it but for the photo.
content.summary: Kc chiefs fly over

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to fort gordon's hunting area and looked up to find the position of the moon when i noticed a bright orb hovering over the nsa complex and i realized it wasn't an airplane because there was no contrail and it descended straight down and vanished. what made me first notice the object was it was so bright and the sky was clear so there was no mistaking that there was something in the sky. when i first saw it i thought it was a flare but it was stationary and didn't moved so i ruled that out then i thought it could be exhaust from an airplane but after i didn't see any airplanes in the area i ruled that out. the object was a bright white orb of light that hovered for a while then it descended and vanished. i felt at the time that this couldn't have been happening so i started looking around to see if anyone else was observing this. i lost sight when the object just vanished.
content.summary: I was driving to fort gordon's hunting area and looked up to find the position of the moon when i noticed a bright orb hovering over the nsa complex and i realized it wasn't an airplane because there was no contrail and it descended straight down

content.detailedDescription: I have attached a screen capture from google earth to help understand the siting. (lat/lon included) i left work as normal had just entered westbound onto round lake bypass. i was the only vehicle in the valley at that moment, which is not normal, but happens occasionally. the traffic circle i had just exited is higher in altitude, and the bridge over the waterway is a gentle arc that dips down over the waterway and rises back up on the other bank. the grey region between my vehicle and the orb (see screenshot) are steep rock embankments as the road bed was dug down into the hillside. this forms a vision tunnel as you enter, there is really nothing to see there, so your eyes naturally shift focus all the way down to the bridge. just seconds after exiting the circle and my vision now focused down into the valley, a white orb shot straight up from just north of the close end of the bridge. this area is a conjunction of: highway bridge, access road, nature trail, stream, retention pond, and drainage ditch. ordinarily, i would ignore a situation like this, except for the velocity situation. while it vaguely resembled a white flare, there was absolutely no change in velocity as it ascended and disappeared. it traveled much faster than vehicles, but slower than ballistics, and as it climbed up out of site (eventually cut off by my vehicle roof-line) there was no fall-off in speed at all. as an engineer who is excellent at estimating, my best guess would be 200 to 300 mph. i know this is not an exciting siting, but the last time i saw an odd light (green light that flashed s->n through my living room), there was an earthquake just minutes later.
content.summary: White orb ascending from waterway at high velocity

content.detailedDescription: I got off work at 2 am in warrensburg i was traveling home to windsor i noticed a blue light was following me when i got into windsor i lost sight of it due to lights in town as soon as i got home i went to bak yard i lived at edge of city limits a hay field is diretly behind where i was living at the time there were no lights just a field i walked to back yard facing lake area  i notied 4 jets coming from the east 4 coming from west i looked out at the area they were flying towards i spotted the blue light i saw what looked like a huge blimp it was blacker than the sky when the jets started getting close the top started to glow  it looked like a volcano that's how i seen it was domed on top then it sped away faster than the speed of light it left flames when it took off the jets were flying low and were in fighting formations they all had missles and im convinced they were gonna try to shoot it the lights in blue springs i seen around truman lake area 6 months before being reported there ive seen many blue like star zipping through the sky sooting straight up at unbelievable speeds i have seen orange fire ball shooting beam towards the ground i seen yellow orbs that when the moved at high speed it moed like a fish when first accelerated i seen these things in 2010 and 2011
content.summary: Large blimp like but domed size of a football stadium

content.detailedDescription:
My boys and i arrived at my mother-in-laws in canton,oh. after baseball to pick up my wife. it was close to 9:30pm and a very clear night sky. she was out back with my mother-in-law and her two other friends. being polite i stuck around to listen to their discussion. i was standing the whole time and just started to look at the sky. all i saw were stars. and just looked to the east, south and west enjoying the night sky. i noticed a larger brighter circle white light much lower than the stars and stationary not flickering. it appeared to be at an altitude that an airliner would fly while making an approach to land a couple miles out. fyi, i live close to a smaller airport, and know the patterns, size and what and airliner looks like at night. the strange part was that there were no airlines in the sky while i was looking around. i continued to look around in the night sky some more, always looking back at that circle brighter light in the sky. i remember a few times looking at my wife's mom and her friends while they where talking. i was really testing to see if that light would go away when i looked back up at it. finally after looking and starring at the light for about the 4th or 5th time. i finally asked my mother-in-law,her friends, and my wife to look at the bright light in the sky. their conversation stopped and everyone just looked at it for about a minute. i think it was one of my son's who asked me what that was. i simply said i don't know. we all starred at the bright light. i looked at my mother-in-law and her friends and everyone was just looking at the light. i looked back at the light which still has not moved in the 12-15min i have been at my mother-in-laws. 

then about 3sec. after i tuned back to look at the circle bright light in the sky. a bright light that was narrow from the bright circle and widened as it reached earth shined down from the circle bright light all the way down to the ground for about 12-15sec. then that light jumped or shot up off the ground to about 3/4 the way down to ground from the ufo for about 2,to 3 sec. then the light shining down jumped/shot up again from the ufo and is now about 1/2 way down to the ground,then for about 1 sec. the light that was shining down jumped/shot up again to about 1/4 way down to the ground from the ufo. at this point the light was almost back to the circle bright light. then within a nano second what was left of the light shining down blacked out and so did the bright circle light. gone. it just disappeared. i looked at my mother-in-law,her friends,wife and everyone's jaw was dropped like they saw a ghost. and we all just looked at each other.

my mother-in-law started making excuses. she said it was a plane. i told her planes don't sit there that long and shine a light down, and said there are no planes around. interestingly enough. i started to see airlines fly by. and pointed to her that is what an airline looks like in the sky which wasn't even remotely close to what we witnessed. in fact, the 12-15 min that the circle light was in the sky there were no airlines. after the circle light was gone. in about 8 min. later i saw two airlines in the sky one flying east to west the other north to south just west of me. and those were the airlines i pointed to my mother-in-law. her friends were still in shock. i didn't know who to call so i went home got online( can't remember the site) and filed a report.
content.summary: Ufo stationary shines light down

content.detailedDescription:
I was in room of a hotel on my bed.  i decided look to outside by the windows of my room and there was that object stoped on the air.
i observed it for aproximately 5 minutes and it just disappeared.  i took a picture before it disappeared.
content.summary: I am in a hotel and when i look to outside that object was there stoped, after 5 minutes it disapeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Please note that the story and supporting evidence will be forwarded to mr thomas wertman, of mufon ohio - who will be dealing with this case.

thank you.
content.summary: Sighting of star-like ufo in north east scotland.

content.detailedDescription: So late august early evening maybe just after sunset around 1974 or1975 i was looking west or southwest over the androscoggin valley, about 15 years old at the time i saw a fireball about the size of an orange and the same color or a bit more red with a tail. like you would expect from a missile but no body leading it. its trajectory was even with the horizon. my thoughts were i saw a fairly large meteor but its size and the fact it was going straight across the horizon had me confused.
content.summary: Looked like missile tail but know craft leading fireball.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
At age 8 i woke about 2-3am knowing somehow i was to go look out my bedroom window. i was calm and actually felt like i was going to see family. i looked out my 2nd story bedroom window to notice a yellow/green pulsating peacful very slow decending orb like object. it rested silently about a block away over the houses and the lights stopped and just a slight outline remained. i knew it was clearly there for me. i recieved messages in my head and understood everything being told/taught to me. words and images . about long before humans , during our ancestors times and warnings of human pride. war was always on their mind not war with is but war among us. that was the day i started and have never been able to stop having a discust for the inhabitants of this world. i'm not saying im alien i'm not crazy.
it's just this sickening feeling lodged so deep it has to be in my dna. several other times leading up to my next visual encounter i've always had frequent what i call my "reprogramming"  it's this settling feeling just before sleep followed by a hollow almost electrical twanging noise and i slip away and usually return fully awake within 30-45 minutes laying in my same spot aware that i have no explication for the time thats passed but i always seem to have new knowledge of things i never heard about or thought of on my own and it's always something to do with this world and its people. the premis of the teachings is always the same . all races and people on this planet need to come together as one and when humans can accomplish that very small feat much much more will be given to us but as of the past up till present we "humans" cannot be trusted i dont know why i'm told this i just know its always the same . cannot be trusted! at age 23 in a gold rush town in the sierra nevadas california i was awoken about the normal time "2-3am" to be drawn out of bed and outside where i witnessed 3 very fast moving and low travelling from east to west triangle shaped craft silent as if they weren't even there but they were so low and so fast i should have heard them but i was not surprised i didnt. but then about 2 minute after they passed out of the northeast i saw 4 incoming low silent fast yellow/green lighted crafts. there was no communication then only a fierce sense of urgency that was so great i sat outside all morning till 7-8am worrying and i didn't even know about what but i just couldn't shake the worrying feeling.. i was even late to work that day. for several more years i went about my life with my eyes in the sky all day all night any free time i ever have i'm living out there even though i'm here.  many more of my "reprogrammings" take place over the next 10+ yrs now living back in my home state again i was traveling home from a friends and at about 2:32am i was instructed to pull over next to this field and i watched them come down and rest silently just above the horizon fairly close to me just grayish outlines of the familiar craft . the electric twangy noise came one thing was different this time i tried to take a picture using my cell phone and it was off when i tried and it was back on upon my return to my vehicle not a physical return but the same type of return i experience during my before sleep experiences .My battery was full and i know it was on cuz i just checked the time on my phone hence the i knew the exact time this encounter took place .... i've never came out to anyone about this i am positive that i posses knowledge given to me for whatever reason i'm not sure if im to keep it or pass it on. or if somehow they were using me as a delivery boy and somehow the teachings given to me have been transmitted to where they belong through me to avoid detection.. i have no clue but as you can see i have explored all options and theory's possible to explain this to myself but as of yet i have no idea why me .. i can tell you this , i feel such shame for being human and for bringing others into this world .. i feel so much pain and sorrow that i will not be here when they come back again it feels truly like a child that misses their parents. sorry if i have wasted your time and all but i needed to get this off my chest because it surly will not leave my mind.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Age 8 illinois, age 23 california, age 36 illinois. 2x's saw crafts all 3x's telepathy contact and several sleep encounters bits n pieces of info

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to pick up one of my kids at a football game an going south on m-66 going south, just before m-66 an capital ave come together i saw lite in the trees to my right, it was odd lite, large an high in the trees, as i was driving, it looked as if it was moving south, for about 20 to 25 sec i could see this lite to my right, the two streets come together like a v shape, that is when an ware the trees open up to a field, an i saw something, large round light's about 8 of then, but the one on the far right light was not round but oblong like a old street lite, i can see aluminum around the light's, it was a soled. it was dark or a blackness around the ship. i could not see a top or bottom of the ship clearly. ware the ship was darker, i could see trees the grass the road the ship, but when you look at the ship the light's were gold an flashed high beams from right to left. i closed my right eye i closed my left eye an hit my head with my hand, took my eye's of it an seen the blue car coming at me, i look back at it, it's still there, above me to the right. then the ship took off to the west in two sec it was gone and going up and gone in a wow. this part of the story is hard to put into words, i had the feeling life was on the ship, and it or them could see me and are from another time. that is all, i hope this help's, p.S. i told a friend an he said he heard some thing on the radio about it, that some one had called the radio station.
content.summary: Driving south, saw light in trees, to my right, travaling about same speed, came to opening. saw darkness an  8 or 9 lights, vary larg as dig as my car round an gold lite, aluminum around lites then it takes off west fast, then it was briter around car.

content.detailedDescription: My husband went outside our front door to smoke a cigarette. he came running back in the house screaming my name, yelling, "come outside!" he was running so hard through our house, his hands smacking the walls, as he was running down the main hallway, that he was shaking the house. i actually thought we were possibly having a small earthquake. i yelled back at him, "hold on!" before i could even get outside, he came back inside screaming for me and my son to hurry up! my son and i go outside and see at eye level, why he was so excited. a brilliant, absolutely gorgeous, sphere was at tree top level, directly across the street from your home, hovering directly over our neighbor's large pine tree. it turned colors from a aqua/neon blue, a cobalt blue, a bright red, a hot white and emerald green. after capturing our full attention, the air show began. the maneuvering capability of this light ship was beyond all comprehension. it would arch it's flight path in a "c" shape jumping over the top of the pine tree, hopping back and forth, over the top of the tree with ease and back again. it would stop about 50' from the left side of the tree top, hover, then free fall to below the tree line, then ascend straight up faster they anything you could ever see at six flaggs, hover again, go behind the tree, jump over the tree, free fall halfway, stop in mid air, free fall again, then ascend straight up, hover on and on and on and on. this lasted for approximately thirty minutes. my husband had the time to go back inside to find his camera, scrambling to find the right camera lens, running inside and outside and he was successful in video taping the light ship. i have tired to upload the 2 clips but i believe one of the two, is too large. i will try again. the ship remained until our age teenage neighbor and his companion arrived by car at their home, where the action was taken place over their heads. as they drove up, they could clearly see the three of us standing in our driveway, excited and my husband with a camera in his hand filming the sky above their home. they naturally crossed the street and walked into our driveway to see what we were doing and to see what we were looking at. it was at this point that the ship dematerialized, as seen on the second video tape attached. i believe it dematerialized because my husband was informing the teens as they were crossing the street, that it was a "ufo" and the two teenagers might have become afraid and the light ship literally dematerialized, just as the two teens were turning to look at it, from our driveway vantage point. i believe this was a completely peaceful contact experience and the "et's" are so kind in fact, that if someone becomes afraid, they will dematerialize their ships to avoid causing anyone, any emotional duress whatsoever. i even tried to tell the teens to not be afraid but the ship did not rematerialized in their presence. we had to show them the video so they would not think we were all crazy. please excuse my husband's profanity in the videos, as he was so frenzied and frantic to film this sighting, that we can now both laugh at his reaction. i, on the other hand, was talking to the craft, thanking it for this awesome experience, asking it if we could photograph it, etc., and my husband clearly wanted me to "shut up!" our conversation on the audio is hilarious. the experience and sighting left me so incredibly happy for hours. while watching it live, i left like i could predict it's next movements. my husband would say, "it's gone." i found myself responding, "no it's not, it is going to come out from behind the tree and drop straight down" and it would. i seriously felt like i was somehow communicating with it and could direct my husband where to point his camera next to try to capture this fast moving object again and again. the best part of this whole experience was that just prior to my husband going to have a smoke outside and seeing this craft at eye level, he and i had just had a brief exchange /squabble about et's. ironically or not, below are the details of our discussion just minutes before his initial sighting. in a nutshell, i am a huge fan of dr. steven greer. i have his et contact app on my cell phone. i was in our bedroom listening to a podcast with dr. greer about the details of his near death experience and i paused the podcast to find my husband in our living room, to tell him about it. i told my husband, unsolicited of course, that i too, like dr. greer, believe that when we die, we go to where we are, consciously and cosmically. so, i was nagging my husband for the 100th time, that i wanted him to increase his conscious awareness, start meditating immediately, quit smoking yesterday and be at a higher level of consciousness, so that by the time we both die, we might have the chance to know each again in another dimension, pending that he cultivate his cosmic awareness. after that lettuce, i walked back to our bedroom to resume my podcast with dr. greer and my husband walked outside and into another dimension. thank you et, thank you mufon and thank you dr. steven greer
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: awesome light ship performing ariel feats not possible with a known current aeronautic technology.

content.detailedDescription: Was on a ridge line in  the mountains of ca where i used to live. at around 2-3 o'clock in march of 2008 i seen what looked like the reflection of a car or other vehicle in the distance. after observing this object for about 3-5 minutes it  moved into a position where i could see a metallic white spherical shape. this object moved from the coast around newport/huntington beach,ca maybe further south. to the bottom of the mountain below wrightwood,ca at extremely high rate of speed in a straight line. this was instantaneous. after doing this 4-5 times it flew off over the horizon in a instant.  after seeing this object i was confused but calm. i didn't know what to think about what i had just seen. i had curiously about this subject but after seeing a object in person i want closure or know if anyone may have seen the same object that i saw that day.
content.summary: Observed sphere like object move at high rate of speed in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday afternoon, after a one-hour teleconference from california with my shaman teacher and fellow students, went outside on my patio to get some fresh air. 

as i was standing on the patio in the sunlight, felt an urge to look up. 
saw something in the sky but did not recognize it as any kind of airplane i have ever seen, and i do like to check out airplanes as my father was a pilot.

there was a also a sound somewhat like a jet engine.


went inside to get my binoculars. the ufo was still in sight when i returned outdoors.  through the binoculars it looked like an aircraft with wings, but the wings glowed and were gold in colour. the body of the ufo seemed silvery-gray in colour. what was really different was that it did not move like any plane i have ever observed flying.  it moved very slowly and seemed to turn right, then return to the center, then turn left, then return to center a couple of times.  this looked really strange and i thought "that sure looks like a ufo".  

this ufo just disappeared suddenly, though the sky was clear and sunny, with no clouds in sight.  

then i saw a second ufo from what i assumed was the back, as there was a double contrail.  this was close to where i saw the first ufo.  this second ufo disappeared suddenly after about 1 minute, leaving no contrails as all. i thought this was quite unusual as contrails usually stay in view for quite a while.

during the sighting i felt quite excited and interested to be seeing something unusual.  have not seen any ufo's for several years.

also, two days after my sighting, there were two articles in the metro newspaper about ufo's.  these were general articles and did not mention any report of a sighting in kanata that weekend.  these articles gave me the idea to contact a ufo reporting webside.  tried to contact the ufo group in manitoba, canada but was unable to report my sighting on their webside, probably due to incompatible software.

luckily remembered mufon, and your webside is conpatible with my rather ancient laptop (thinkpad t61), reconditioned but works quite well.

both ufo's disappeared very suddenly, not the usual way that airplanes disappear into the distance as i watch them. 

these unusual appearances and flight behaviours were what made me think i was observing a ufo.

i was so excited to be viewing the ufo's that i completely forgot to take photos.  i will make an effort to use my camera to take photos if and when i have another sighting.
content.summary: Sighted two ufo's with binoculars

content.detailedDescription: I was going to lock the front door when i notice what i thought was car lights reflecting on the glass door. i looked down the street and saw a triangle shaped object in the sky. the lights were really bright so i went outside to take a closer look. the object was traveling slow and hovered along the tree line. as it passed over my head i could see the outline of the object. i heard absolutely nothing. the object appeared to be 20-30 feet in size. i live near a military base that fly's planes and helicopters all the time. this object made no noise as it passed over head. i ran from the front of the house to the back and then lost sight.
content.summary: Triangle shaped hovering slow moving bright lights at tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
1979 ��� i was sitting on a bench over looking the beach (waves breaking 10 feet in front of us)at point magu with two friends, one male and one female. across the cove, maybe 200 feet away was a group of 10 to 12 people enjoying a camp fire on the beach. suddenly we saw an object about a half mile to a mile out over the water, about 100 feet high. this was the classic flying saucer shape, with lights around the diameter of the craft. at first it just hovered there for about a minute and then a very bright light about 10 foot diameter shown on us for 30 seconds or so. the light went off, the craft flew at a high speed to the left - it moved what looked like about 1 mile in a blink of an eye, then to the right just as fast back in front of us, then flew up at about a 45 degree angle at an unbelievable speed, and was gone. 
we looked at the group of people at the camp fire around the cove and they were yelling "it had the light on you"! they all ran to their cars and drove away very quickly! this craft made no sound, and moved in a stealth way. if we (humans) have this type of technology, all of us should know. some of my friends that i have told this to think it was probably a military proto-type -- not a chance. nothing we know of could move like this craft. to this day, my friend's wife (one of us three witnesses) refuses to talk about it with my friend and i, or anyone. i truly feel privileged to have witnessed this amazing event that was seen by at least 12 people.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saucer over the ocean hovering, shown bean on us, then craft flew away

content.detailedDescription:
sitting in my spa at the rear of my house approximately 9:30 pm. yes, i had a couple of drinks. at the corner of my eye, i thought i saw lights of a plane. but the light where not acting right. the lights changed position so it attracted my attention. i looked up and it looked like it flew over me about 50 to 100 feet in the air traveling the speed of a small plane.
  circular blue/white area, obviously under a unseen craft. in the area was multi colored lightning strikes crossing each other, blue, white, green, and yellow. then, (this is what attracted my attention) the lightning strikes left the blue /white area and that area turned black (unseen). the lightning strikes traveled up one side of the craft, so all i could see is the multi colored lightning strikes going up the right side of the craft. i could see the shape of the craft by how the strikes went up the side and i saw strikes follow a vertical seam. i was able to see the lightning strikes go from the blue/white area to the outside of the craft five (5) times until it traveled passed a two story dwelling. 
  it seemed to me that it was a malfunction, maybe that is why i saw it.
content.summary: Over head, a circular orb under a craft. in the orb was different colored lightning strikes crossing each other

content.detailedDescription: I am finally attempting to relay the facts of someone's viewing of a ufo in approximately the middle of 1971.  i was on active duty status at a radar site on the us/canadian border when a woman called into our site, relaying her seeing a ufo hover over her house and scare the daylights out of her, her children and their dogs.  since i was on duty that evening, i was able to verify that an unknown object (blip) was viewed and followed on my radar screen for approximately one half hour.  when i went up to my sergeant on duty that evening, he was writing down her report.  as soon as she hung up, he tore the report up and threw it away and advised me "if you report this, you will be busted." so, i have kept this secret all these years and feel i need to let your organization know what the air force is doing regarding ufo's and their own people.
content.summary: Radar verifier for actual observer

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: i saw this object over two nights starting on 12/22/2012. i saw it both nights for two nights ending on the 23rd. always around 8 pm and always in the south.This account is from 12/23/12 i live in a small rural town in middle tn so anything changing colors in the sky is easily noticed. i first noticed it while leaving my home around 8:30 to go to the store.I first thought it was an airplane which is a normal sight here but it seemed to be lower in the sky and closer than normal planes. also it had flashing lights of red,blue,green and white which at first was all i could see until the angle changed as it flew in what appeared to be a north easterly direction. at that point i could actually see that it did have a dark surface outline that was definitely not a plane as i could see no wings or tail. as i drove to the store it was visible the entire way and did nothing extraordinary. the distance is less than a mile. as i reached the store a worker was outside and was also watching the object. we talked about it for a second or two i then entered the store bought a drink and exited. as i exited, the worker said look it got lower. and in fact it was then very, very low in the sky and stationary. as i drove home the object was behind me so i could not see it but when i got to my house i could still see it and remembered i had my cell phone. i set it to video mode and attempted to video the object with no luck. for some reason i could see the object but couldn't get it to show up on the viewfinder nor the video as i was not used to filming with my phone. just then my neighbor pulled up and i asked her if she had seen it. she said yes but asked me to point it out again as she had lost sight while driving. at that point i saw the object begin to descend, suddenly the lights went off but i could still make out the dark outline for maybe two to three seconds. it then disappeared from my sight. i do not know if it got too low or if i just couldn't see it due to darkness. either way, it was gone. the reason that i am just now reporting this is because i had forgotten about it until tonight when i was copying files from the phone i used that night to a new a new cell phone. funny that i could just forget about it because at the time it kinda freaked me out. but these days i seem to forget things all the time. im not even that old.....Lol.....Just 43. anyway, sorry for getting off track. i hope this helps and if i see more i will definitely report it. if i don't forget, lol!
content.summary: Dark round object with pulsating, different colord lights.

content.detailedDescription: i was driving along tollway 161southbound in the dallas, tx area near the dfw airport in december of 2009, and i noticed a lot of vehicles pulling over to the side of the road so i slowed down to below 20mi an hour and i looked towards the east and saw a massive ufo. i pulled off to the side of the road for approximately 10-15 minutes and took a few pictures of the craft with my cell phone camera, the object was very large about the size of a baseball field and diamond shape it was very reflective and had multiple color lights around the edges it appeared as if it were in a transition from an invisibility cloaking technology to being visible to the naked eye it moved very slowly for approximately 10 minutes and then disappeared. dozens of people were pulled over to view the object and after a few minutes my cell phone would not allow me to pull up my camcorder or outgoing calls then when the object disappeared my phone was back to normal. the photos i submitted will show everyone pulled off to the side and at first glance the photo looks like the sun but you will notice the sun in the west and the object has many different colors around the edges. i am only submitting this information now because at the time of the occurrence i was in the u.S army and didn't want to compromise my security clearance.
content.summary: Massive unidentified craft

content.detailedDescription: Near i-10 and fm 1463  around 6:30 tonight, here was a weird, low, dark cloud with lightning & thunder over the agave real venue parking lot. i got out of my car to take pictures of the dark cloud  with the windmill in front of it. i took several  pictures before the wind picked up and big drop of rain blew in.  i didn't see the objects until i got home and looked at the pictures! i've been bit freaked out about it! that's why i'm on this site...To see if anyone else saw it too!
content.summary: Ufo in weird dark clouds

content.detailedDescription: About 10 guys i went to jr. high school with were riding our motorcycles on horse trails in chicamauga nat'l battlefield park in north georgia near chattanooga, tm.  we stopped  next to a field to smoke a cigarette.  i heard one of the boys say, "hey, what's that?  i turned around and saw a green orb next to the timeline.  it moved back and forth left to right, then back right to left and up and down near the ground.  we watched it for at least 10 min., then it started coming toward us.  we got the hell out of there and didn't look back.  we blamed it on swamp gas ( even though no swamps were around)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 10 fourteen year old boys see green orb (just saw on hangar 1 that they're called. plasma orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home and noticed one area to the north east of me beginning to look a little bit tornadic ...On a particularly clear sky evening...As i pulled to my house i got out of the car and began photographing and filming this system develop i called to my wife to come see and it see filmed it on my phone and got lots of photos of the storm.
it wasn't like anything we had ever seen ..As can be seen in the video.
there were no sirens. after a while we went inside as it was creeping further away.
i joked in the video that there's prbly a spaceship in there...But what i discovered after going through the stream of photos i had taken in hopes of catching pictures of the lightning.
i only actually got a couple of strikes ...But what i saw in one of those lucky photos ...Blew my mind and i must say ...This is as close to believing that cloaked spaceships may actually be using storms as cover or perhaps creating storms for cover...
is it possible that this ship was submerged in a nearby lake and was drying off or something prior to departure? as ignorant as that sounds!
maybe it was too heavy for flight?
whatever it was doing it was quite a show !
it's should have done it on a actual cloudy day cause it has raised some eyebrows.
in the photo.. notice the line  where the lightning stops 
also some type of running lights.
the line actually seems to have a reflection of a lightning bolt on it ...If u follow the line it makes a donut type cylinder shape(saucer like).
please know that this is not doctored and i hope u are excited as i am about this and am hoping for feedback.

david

i alologize for the camera tilting back and forth i was trying to get the whole thing in the camera it was a huge storm cloud .
content.summary: One giant storm cloud in a clear sky amazing lightning reveals something strange in photos very peculiar showed up in just one frame  of many

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to go to work, around 6:45 leaving home, driving few blocks on market st. (east) en paterson. i have stop light on the way,so i always look to sky and see the trail, went i see this thing raise to the sky but perfect vertical way, weird way of the trail, and try to recorder but the light change, but few block away the is a fast food parking, get the parking and star record the trail how straight look and one of the videos show a plane cross near, of the trail. sorry i was late to working hours
content.summary: The object raised vertical leaving trail, just straight line from the ground to the space.

content.detailedDescription: What i saw that morning were two very visible flying saucers. i noticed the first one coming from the west and heading east. then i noticed a second one coming from the south. when they started getting closer looking like they were going to hook up or something, the first one heading east make a complete stop. and when the second one which was heading south reached the first one, it made a turn to head east. it was very cold out that morning, and i didn't have very much on to stay out much longer. i think i was standing out there for about 10 minutes. neither one was moving at a fast speed. but because the sky was rather bright that night, i hade no problem in getting a good view of both of them. so after that incident, i made it a habit to look up at the night sky every night. and what i have been seeing is something that i have no idea of what they are. and this is every night when the sky is clear enough to see them. and there are anywhere from five to thirteen of them that i can see. and now because i have mentioned this, more and more people are coming forward that saying that they are seeing these strange things every night also. i don't know if you would be interested to follow up on this. i have so much more to tell that would take up too much space here. but all kinds of crazy stuff has been going on. everyone that i have talked to don't know if these things are from another planet, or if they are from our own government. i hope that i will be able to talk to one of your staff to fill them in on all the details.
content.summary: One was heading from west to east, and the other was heading south, then turned to head east

content.detailedDescription:
Was unsure if it was static electricity until the moved in unison in a circle. around 5-6 orbs appearing and dissapearing gave off an ominous glow over the clouds and moved in sparatic paths that changed instantaneously. 

tried to get a video on my phone will review evidence and see if i can get anything clear.

amazing sight, had to run inside and grab my gf to record it. heart pounding and iv always wondered when id see something like this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Smoking a cigg outback and noticed several orbs above the clouds moving in unison in a circle

content.detailedDescription: i was getting ready for bed and looked out the window to look at the stars.  i observed a flash of light and at first thought it was a helicopter, but it was moving too fast.  the flash of light was bright red and moving above the tree tops at a tremendous speed.  i joked to my husband that i just witnessed a ufo.  i couldn't get it out of my mind, so looked on the computer for any sightings in kent and the ufo stalker had an article describing about the same thing near the same area..The date was february 2, 2014.  mufon case #53869.
content.summary: Brilliant red light going so fast, but low above the trees.  no blinking lights. just like the case # 53869 on 2/2/14

content.detailedDescription:
I couldn't sleep the night of 3/27/2014, so went out side to have a cigarette and look at the stars between the hours of 11:30pm and 1:00am 3/28/2014. it was a breezy, clear night, with very few clouds in the sky. i leaned back on the deck railing and tilted my head back to see the stars. as i looked up, the wind quickly died down to a calm silence and then i noticed the black/slightly reflective chevron v shaped object come into vision from the south east over the tree tops. the object proceeded to glide directly over my head aprox 200-400 feet in altitude with no sound and no light emitted in a slight arch to the west. i estimate that the v was between 12-20 feet wide. within 5-10 seconds i lost sight of the object behind a large tree in my back yard. as i tried to re acquire the object i saw one star sized flash of light in the same direction the object was headed, then 5 seconds later one last flash of light in the same location.
           at first i was skeptical of this sighting, as i live within 2 miles of a commuter airport, but due to the lack of any landing or strobe lights, the path of travel, no sound, and only 2 flashes of light in the distance i believe this was a legitimate ufo sighting weather extraterrestrial or military drone. 
            two other interesting facts about the location are that: #1 there is a large secluded public fishing lake in the exact path of the ufo travel and #2 the navy regularly conducts touch and go training with e-2 hawkeye early warning radar planes at our public airport which is roughly 250 miles inland from norfolk va.
content.summary: Dark v shaped object gliding aprox 100feet above tree tops. aprox 20 feet tip to tip

content.detailedDescription:
My grade school buddy and i were sleeping out side in a camper type structure with a blanket covering one side.  we woke up early in the morning and moved the blanket to look out.  when we opened the blanket we noticed an object coming from the north near glacier national park, mt.  at first we thought it might be an airplane which would be extremely rare. as kids of  the age of 11 or 12 we were very interested in building model airplanes so wanted we kept watching.  it wasn't moving very fast.  when we got a closer look of the object it was disk shaped, dull gray luster, and a slight dome in the top.  it was not any kind of airplane etc of that time in the early 1950's.  we then became excited and wanted a better look at the object so ran into the house and retrieved a set of 750 size field glasses which are very power full. the object hovered approximately 1000feet above the city of hungry horse mt where at the time the hungry horse damn was just being completed.  it hovered for several minutes then very slowly began moving to our right approximately one half mile the stopped and hovered again.  i got the idea that it might be observing hungry horse dam.
after hovering for a few minutes again it began ascending in a left arc at an extremely high rate of speed into the cloud cover.  of course nobody believed us but we found  this sighting to be exciting and since i'm 72 now i think it is time to pass this story on to mufon.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Came from the north-hovered -moved to the right-ascended in an arc like a rocket.

content.detailedDescription: I was videotaping a fireworks display at the time. did not realize the object that was flying around in the sky until a day or so later. the videotape speaks for itself. the angle the craft was flying was almost above me but not quite. it was flying at a high rate of speed. i freeze framed the video and at several times it was moving so fast it is just a blur of light. at one point the the object looks like it is warped. the object is shaped like a capsule and has a beam of light coming from it. had i have known at the time what i was filming i would have continued to film this. i would like to know if anyone else has noticed this as there were others there videotaping.
content.summary: I videotaped this from my cellphone while watching a fireworks display. it looks like this craft was watching the fireworks flying at very fast speeds.
